test_case.title: Dropdown List Verification in Spotlight Search for 'k' Input
pre_condition: The user has any Mac device with macOS 11 (Big Sur), macOS 12 (Monterey), macOS 13 (Ventura), or macOS 14 (Sonoma) with an operational Spotlight Search.

steps.expected_result: Spotlight Search opens in the middle of the screen.

steps.action: Enter the letter 'k' in the search field.
steps.expected_result: The letter 'k' is inputted into the search field.

steps.action: Observe if a dropdown list opens automatically with additional search suggestions or results related to Keynote.
steps.expected_result: A dropdown list appears with search suggestions related to Keynote.

steps.action: Check that the following items are displayed in the dropdown list on the left side:
expected_result: Keynote.app with its respective icon
Keychain Access.app with its respective icon
Keyboard with its respective icon
After the "Keyboard" item, there should be a continuous string visible.
Icon of the Safari Browser with the letter 'k'
After the "Safari Browser with the 'k' letter" item, there should be a continuous string visible.
System Settings with icons for Keyboard, Known networks, Keyboard shortcuts, and Keyboard shortcut.
After the "Keyboard shortcut" item, there should be a continuous string visible.
Additionally, "Photos From Apps" should be shown on the left side, and "Show More with >" should be on the right side.
Some photos should be displayed horizontally, with at least six of them visible.
The dropdown list should allow vertical scrolling.
Scrolling down, more items should be visible beyond the initial view.
All specified items mentioned in the dropdown list are displayed on the left side as follows:
Keynote.app with its respective icon
Keychain Access.app with its respective icon
Keyboard with its respective icon
After the "Keyboard" item, there should be a continuous string visible.
Icon of the Safari Browser with the letter 'k'
After the "Safari Browser with the 'k' letter" item, there should be a continuous string visible.
System Settings with icons for Keyboard, Known networks, Keyboard shortcuts, and Keyboard shortcut.
After the "Keyboard shortcut" item, there should be a continuous string visible.
Additionally, "Photos From Apps" should be shown on the left side, and "Show More with >" should be on the right side.
Some photos should be displayed horizontally, with at least six of them visible.
The dropdown list should allow vertical scrolling.
Scrolling down, more items should be visible beyond the initial view.
